custom-sql.sql: SELECT * FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$STATUS$] [$TYPE$] [$ACCSTARTUS$] ORDER BY tf.accountId DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$STATUS$] [$TYPE$] [$ACCSTARTUS$]

SELECT * FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$HINHTHUCDANGKY$] [$SOGIAYTO$] [$TUNGAY$] [$DENNGAY$] [$SODIENTHOAI$] [$TENTAIKHOAN$] [$LOAIDOITUONG$] [$CANBOXACMINH$] [$TINHTRANG$] ORDER BY tf.accountId DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$HINHTHUCDANGKY$] [$SOGIAYTO$] [$TUNGAY$] [$DENNGAY$] [$SODIENTHOAI$] [$TENTAIKHOAN$] [$LOAIDOITUONG$] [$CANBOXACMINH$] [$TINHTRANG$]

SELECT * FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$HINHTHUCDANGKY$] [$SOGIAYTO$] [$TUNGAY$] [$DENNGAY$] [$SODIENTHOAI$] [$TENTAIKHOAN$] [$LOAIDOITUONG$] [$TINHTRANG$] [$EMAIL$] ORDER BY tf.accountId DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$HINHTHUCDANGKY$] [$SOGIAYTO$] [$TUNGAY$] [$DENNGAY$] [$SODIENTHOAI$] [$TENTAIKHOAN$] [$LOAIDOITUONG$] [$TINHTRANG$] [$EMAIL$]

SELECT * FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$HINHTHUCDANGKY$] [$SOGIAYTO$] [$TUNGAY$] [$DENNGAY$] [$SODIENTHOAI$] [$TENTAIKHOAN$] [$LOAIDOITUONG$] [$TINHTRANG$] [$EMAIL$] ORDER BY tf.accountId DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$HINHTHUCDANGKY$] [$SOGIAYTO$] [$TUNGAY$] [$DENNGAY$] [$SODIENTHOAI$] [$TENTAIKHOAN$] [$LOAIDOITUONG$] [$TINHTRANG$] [$EMAIL$]
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$EMAIL$] [$USERNAME$] [$FULLNAME$] [$TELNO$] [$TINHTRANG$]
SELECT * FROM idm_account tf WHERE 1=1 [$KEYWORD$] [$EMAIL$] [$USERNAME$] [$FULLNAME$] [$TELNO$] [$TINHTRANG$] ORDER BY tf.accountId DESC
